summary: A collection of unit tests for the AWS Managed Blockchain service, providing helper utilities and comprehensive test cases that exercise creation, retrieval, updating, deletion, and error handling for invitations, members, networks, nodes, proposals, and proposal votes using mocked AWS services.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of Managed Blockchain client implementations, ensuring they handle both typical workflows and edgeâ€‘case failures, thereby supporting reliable deployment and continuous integration.
